meanings.definition: A system of therapy that employs manipulation of connective tissue and muscle to relieve pain and restore normal function.
meanings.sent1: After my naprapathy session, my back felt much better.
meanings.sent2: She decided to try naprapathy to alleviate her muscle pain.
meanings.sent3: The naprapathy treatment made me feel like a new person!
meanings.sent4: Naprapathy is like a soothing melody for your body's aches.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of naprapathy amazed me with its gentle touch.

meanings.definition: The practice of treating connective tissue disorders through manual manipulation and physical therapy.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended naprapathy for my joint issues.
meanings.sent2: Naprapathy has been helping many patients with their mobility.
meanings.sent3: I never knew naprapathy could be so relaxing!
meanings.sent4: Her skill in naprapathy turned my stiffness into flexibility.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of naprapathy are truly remarkable for those in need.
